## [Das Paket `rMaps`](https://github.com/ramnathv/rMaps)

```{r,eval=F}
require(devtools)
install_github('ramnathv/rCharts@dev')
install_github('ramnathv/rMaps')
install.packages("leaflet")
```

## Die interaktive Karte

```{r,eval=F}
library(rMaps)
crosslet(
  x = "country", 
  y = c("web_index", "universal_access", "impact_empowerment", "freedom_openness"),
  data = web_index
)
```


## Das Paket leaflet

```{r}
library(leaflet)

m = leaflet() %>% addTiles()
m 
```


## Weltkulturerbe Datensatz einlesen

```{r}
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Japhilko/GeoData/master/2015/data/whcSites.csv"

whcSites <- read.csv(url) 
```



## Das Paket `DT`

```{r}
library(DT)
datatable(whcSites)
```
